GSD.product_version: versions from v4.4 to before v5.15.76
GSD.description:
mm,hugetlb: take hugetlb_lock before decrementing h->resv_huge_pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.76 by commit 112a005d1ded04a4b41b6d01833cc0bda90625cc, it was introduced in version v4.4 by commit a88c769548047b21f76fd71e04b6a3300ff17160. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm,hugetlb: take hugetlb_lock before decrementing h->resv_huge_pages
